title: 517. Are M.B.A.s to Blame for Wage Stagnation?
description: New research finds that bosses who went to business school pay their workers less. So what are M.B.A. programs teaching — and should they stop?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
